answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Hi Katherine,
I could not find an RFP that contained all the components in your inquiry. However, I was able to come across some RFPs that contained several of the criteria. They're from the City of Woodland, CA and Weber County, UT Weber County which seek i proposals for the purchase of software for a fleet management information system capable of storing, managing, and providing management reports on all
information pertaining to vehicular and maintenance equipment assets. I hope you find them of some use and helpful.

author: Katherine Woerner Caffrey
text:
We are looking to issue an RFP for a software that does the following:
1. fleet management
2. work orders
3. asset management
4. inventory control
5. fuel maintenance
6. attend City Council meetings
Okay, everything but #6. Does anyone have any example RFPs? 
Or, any comments about a software you use currently (like it, hate it, etc)? 
Thanks!
title: RFP for Public Works & Utilities Software
